works.description:
This has already been reported (7 July  
2011) and was removed on 9 July 2011. It has been put straight back
online.
The album, in Lolly's Gallery, named Noah's Ark, contains 11 scanned image
 
of each page of Alan Dart's copyrighted pattern. The quality of each scan 

is such that , by downloading the images, he whole pattern can be
illegally  
obtained. This infringes Alan's copyright, and that of Future Publishing. 

Below is the url of the album.
